column2: Each facet of the Crystalline Mean has a list of requested deliveries. <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Iola<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> of the <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Facet of Forging<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> will accept items from <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>blacksmiths<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>armorers<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, and <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>goldsmiths<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>. The items requested will vary according to your level, and may be crafted by any of the corresponding classes. To begin the crafting process, select <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Logs<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> from the main menu, followed by <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Crafting Log<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>. Next, select <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Special Recipes<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> from within the requisite crafting discipline, then <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Class<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, and lastly <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Crystarium Deliveries<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> to locate the desired recipe. The esteem gauge will build with each successful delivery. Fill the gauge completely and your <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>esteem level<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> will increase, allowing you to progress through the story.<hex:02100103><hex:02100103>You may deliver both normal and high-quality items, and you can also submit multiple items simultaneously. High-quality items do not result in a larger increase in esteem, but you will receive greater rewards upon delivery.

Each facet of the Crystalline Mean has a list of requested deliveries. <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Thiuna<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> of the <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Facet of Crafting<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> will accept items from <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>carpenters<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>leatherworkers<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, and <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>weavers<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>. The items requested will vary according to your level, and may be crafted by any of the corresponding classes. To begin the crafting process, select <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Logs<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> from the main menu, followed by <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Crafting Log<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>. Next, select <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Special Recipes<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> from within the requisite crafting discipline, then <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Class<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, and lastly <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Crystarium Deliveries<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> to locate the desired recipe. The esteem gauge will build with each successful delivery. Fill the gauge completely and your <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>esteem level<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> will increase, allowing you to progress through the story.<hex:02100103><hex:02100103>You may deliver both normal and high-quality items, and you can also submit multiple items simultaneously. High-quality items do not result in a larger increase in esteem, but you will receive greater rewards upon delivery.

Each facet of the Crystalline Mean has a list of requested deliveries. <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Bethric<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> of the <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Facet of Nourishing<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> will accept items from <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>alchemists<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> and <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>culinarians<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>. The items requested will vary according to your level, and may be crafted by either of the corresponding classes. To begin the crafting process, select <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Logs<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> from the main menu, followed by <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Crafting Log<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>. The esteem gauge will build with each successful delivery. Fill the gauge completely and your <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>esteem level<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> will increase, allowing you to progress through the story.<hex:02100103><hex:02100103>You may deliver both normal and high-quality items, and you can also submit multiple items simultaneously. High-quality items do not result in a larger increase in esteem, but you will receive greater rewards upon delivery.

Each facet of the Crystalline Mean has a list of requested deliveries. <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Qeshi-Rae<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> of the <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Facet of Gathering<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> will accept items from <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>miners<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> and <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>botanists<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>. The items requested will vary according to your level, and may be gathered by either of the corresponding classes. The esteem gauge will build with each successful delivery. Fill the gauge completely and your <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>esteem level<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> will increase, allowing you to progress through the story.

Each facet of the Crystalline Mean has a list of requested deliveries. <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Frithrik<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> of the <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Facet of Fishing<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> will accept items from <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>fishers<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>.
